attributes.action: lead from the front and introduce a 3 year, below inflation, pay deal for MP's in line with that proposed for other public sector workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the govt. introduce a 3 year pay deal policy for public sector workers then MPs should lead from the front and accept the same terms and conditions for themselves and their staff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
